metadata.title: CVE-2024-44998 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:atm: idt77252: prevent use after free in dequeue_rx()We can't dereference "skb" after calling vcc->push() because the skbis released.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
